instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2915: What is 820-2915? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: Can anyone recommend a reliable repair service for an <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> BGA issue board?
threads.message: I have a customer who wants his 2011 MacBook Pro 15" fixed. I don't mess with this repair but he really wants it fixed so I'm trying to find someone who's doing these successfully. Let me know. Thanks.
